products.name: Cappuccino
products.description: Like café latte, café mocha is based on espresso and hot milk but with added chocolate flavouring and sweetener, typically in the form of cocoa powder and sugar. Many varieties use chocolate syrup instead, and some may contain dark or milk chocolate

products.name: Cappuccino
products.description: Espresso is generally denser than coffee brewed by other methods, having a higher concentration of suspended and dissolved solids; it generally has a creamy foam on top known as crema. Espresso is the base for a number of other coffee drinks, such as latte, cappuccino, macchiato, mocha, and americano.

products.name: Cappuccino
products.description: An iced cappuccino is a coffee drink with espresso, milk, ice, and optional sweetener. It's very similar to an iced latte, which makes sense since a cappuccino vs latte are incredibly similar. The difference? A Starbucks iced cappuccino uses just a splash of milk in the espresso and adds cold foam as a frothy topping.

products.name: Cappuccino
products.description: An iced cappuccino is a coffee drink with espresso, milk, ice, and optional sweetener. It's very similar to an iced latte, which makes sense since a cappuccino vs latte are incredibly similar. The difference? A Starbucks iced cappuccino uses just a splash of milk in the espresso and adds cold foam as a frothy topping.

products.name: Espresso
products.description: Espresso (/ɛˈsprɛsoʊ/ (audio speaker iconlisten), Italian: [eˈsprɛsso]) is a coffee-brewing method of Italian origin,[1] in which a small amount of nearly boiling water (about 90 °C or 190 °F) is forced under 9–10 bars (900–1,000 kPa; 130–150 psi) of pressure through finely-ground coffee beans. Espresso coffee can be made with a wide variety of coffee beans and roast degrees.

products.name: Espresso
products.description: Lungo is a coffee beverage made by using an espresso machine to make an Italian-style coffee – short black (a single espresso shot) with more water (generally twice as much), resulting in a larger coffee, a lungo.

products.name: Espresso
products.description: The espresso romano is made by combining an espresso shot with a lemon slice or lemon juice and a teaspoon of sugar. The slice can be squeezed or dropped into the coffee, and is sometimes candied. It's a versatile drink that can be served hot, cold, or iced – and with or without milk.

products.name: American
products.description: Caffè Americano (also known as Americano or American; Italian pronunciation: [kafˈfɛ ameriˈkaːno]; Spanish: café americano, literally American coffee) is a type of coffee drink prepared by diluting an espresso with hot water, giving it a similar strength to, but different flavor from, traditionally brewed coffee.

favorites.name: Espresso
favorites.description: The espresso romano is made by combining an espresso shot with a lemon slice or lemon juice and a teaspoon of sugar. The slice can be squeezed or dropped into the coffee, and is sometimes candied. It's a versatile drink that can be served hot, cold, or iced – and with or without milk.
